New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored a career-best 109 runs for South Africa
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul for just 10 runs
South Africa won by a significant margin of 104 runs
Key Match Events: A 163-run stand between Rilee Rossouw and Quinton de Kock set up South Africa's total
Anrich Nortje's four-wicket haul and Tabraiz Shamsi's three-wicket contribution were decisive moments
Post-Match Reflections: Rilee Rossouw expressed pride in the win
Shakib Al Hasan highlighted South Africa's fast bowling strength
Michael Sinha praised Bavuma's strategic decisions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground
Spin bowling played a crucial role in the win
South Africa's net run rate improved significantly
